biography.bio: Mikiyo Ono is an actress, known for Zero Woman: The Hunted (1997).

biography.bio: Reina Tanaka was born on November 11, 1989 in Kurume, Fukuoka, Japan. She is an actress, known for Vanpaia sutôrîzu: Brothers (2011), Vanpaia sutôrîzu: Chasers (2011) and Zero Woman: The Hunted (1997).
biography.name: Reina Tanaka

biography.bio: Kou Watanabe is an actor, known for The Last Cabaret (1988), Zero Woman: The Hunted (1997) and Megalopolis Expressway Trial 5: Final Battle (1992).
biography.name: Kou Watanabe

biography.bio: Yoshiaki Fujiwara is an actor, known for Zero Woman: The Hunted (1997), Gohatto (1999) and Yakuza 3 (2009).
biography.name: Yoshiaki Fujiwara

biography.bio: Daisuke Ryû was born on February 14, 1957 in Tokyo, Japan as Chang Myong-nam. He is an actor, known for Ran (1985), Kagemusha, l'ombre du guerrier (1980) and Après la pluie (1999).
biography.name: Daisuke Ryû

biography.bio: Kazuki Nagasawa is an actor, known for Zero Woman: The Hunted (1997).
biography.name: Kazuki Nagasawa

biography.bio: Jonathan Boggs is an actor, known for Ayane's High Kick (1998), Photon (1997) and Zero Woman: Dangerous Game (1998).
biography.name: Jonathan Boggs

biography.bio: Rebecca Honig is known for her work on I'd Rather Be Dead Than Live in This World (2005), Sonic Rush (2005) and Chaotic (2006).
biography.name: Rebecca Honig

biography.bio: Carol Jacobanis is an actress, known for Animation Runner Kuromi 2 (2004), Judith (2003) and Genshiken (2004).
biography.name: Carol Jacobanis

biography.bio: Viktor Krüger (engl. Krueger) is a trained actor from Austria, former professional athlete (American Football and Pro-Wrestling) in USA and Japan, a professional bodyguard, and a former professional wrestler for the WCW in Atlanta, Georgia USA. After his high school graduation in his hometown Graz in Austria, he absolved the mandatory Austrian military service as well. Then he moved to the USA to play College and professional American Football, before being recruited by the back then biggest professional wrestling organization WCW in Atlanta, Georgia. To this date Viktor Krüger remains the only Austrian worker for this company a TBS subsidiary and for the whole United States as well. After fulfilling his 3-year contract, Viktor started working for the fight organization Battlarts in Tokio, Japan where he did 19 tours to participating in over 73 shootfights able to secure 2 championships amongst other numerous achievements. During one of his tours to the land of the rising sun he was movie casted for the first time as the Yakusa king bodyguard in the Japanese movie "Zero Woman" directed by Norihisa Yoshimura. Throughout his illustrious 20-year pro-wrestling career Viktor was progressively casted for the international TV and film industry. Today Viktor Krüger is a regular lead cast especially for German and Austrian productions as a trained professional actor: "I'm just a big fan of a well told story".
biography.name: Viktor Krüger

biography.bio: Lynna Lewis is an actress, known for Magic Woman M (1998), DNA² (1994) and Gall Force: New Era (1991).
biography.name: Lynna Lewis

biography.bio: David Logan Rankin was born in Houston, Texas, September 14th, 1961. David began his acting career in 1974 at Studio 7 in Houston, under the direction of Chris Wilson. As a teenager, he studied and performed at The Humphrey's School, associated with Theater Under the Stars, performing and studying there until 1980, when he moved to New York City to study at The American Academy of Dramatic Arts, graduating in 1982. Mr Rankin has performed with the Alley Theater, The Urban Theatre Company, was Co-Artistic Director and a performer with The Chamber Repertory, performing many productions under the auspices of DiverseWorks, Inc. In New York, David was a mainstay of The Shakespeare Project, performing many roles with the company until he became Managing Director of the company for the last two seasons. Mr Rankin was also Artist-in-Residence at Mabou Mines/PS122 Artist Suite, where he developed & performed his original play, "Mister Nameless Returns - An Epic Theatre Piece in Three Movements with a Prelude and an Aftermath". Also in NYC, David has performed with Raw Theatre Space, Intar53, The Hypothetical Theatre Company and The Metropolitan Theater. His film credits include "The Doll", directed by Shal Ngo, "Brute", directed by Bonnie Black and "Saint Janet", directed by Habib Azar. Mr. Rankin continues to perform in theater and film, having based himself in New York City since his return in 1996.
biography.name: David Logan Rankin

biography.bio: Tom Wayland is known for his work on Pokémon (1997), Robin Hood: Mischief in Sherwood (2014) and Chaotic (2006).
biography.name: Tom Wayland

biography.bio: Buddy Woodward is an actor and composer, known for The Irresponsible Captain Tylor (1993), Entre elle et lui (1998) and Ichi the Killer: Episode 0 (2002).
biography.name: Buddy Woodward
